author: rhuijben
msg: (do_open): Following up on r39469, r39470 close the parent lock
on failing to lock the child. Not the child lock we didn't obtain.

author: rhuijben
msg: (do_open): Following up on r39469, fix two very stupid stupid typos
introduced by adding some final touches to a patch around 5 AM.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the usage of svn_wc_entries_read() from the recursive access baton
opening code. This also removes the initial set of the entries hash which
happened on almost all of our code paths.
(do_open): Use result, scratch pool pattern. Find the child batons via
the wc-db apis instead of by reading all entries in the entries hash.
Remove an obsolete command on checking whether working copy directories
are related. This is handled by the wc-db apis now.

author: gstein

author: rhuijben
msg: (svn_wc__set_depth): Don't search an entry in a NULL entry hash.
